Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Miraflor Suites in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from Yumbo Shopping Center and close to Kasbah Shopping Center. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of CITA Shopping Center and Holiday World Maspalomas.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 100 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Flat-screen televisions with premium TV channels are provided, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Miraflor Suites. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Miraflor Suites. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool.
Make yourself at home in one of the 100 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Flat-screen televisions with premium TV channels are provided, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected.

With a stay at Miraflor Suites in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from Yumbo Shopping Center and close to Kasbah Shopping Center. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of CITA Shopping Center and Holiday World Maspalomas.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Yumbo Shopping Center - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Kasbah Shopping Center - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Las Burras Beach - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Meloneras Beach - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
El Aguila Beach - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Palmitos Park - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Puerto Rico Shopping Center - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi

The preferred airport for Miraflor Suites is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 26.8 km / 16.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
